text: Phaseolus pauciflorus is a species of wild bean native to Mexico and Guatemala. ==Taxonomy== The name Phaseolus pauciflorus has been used to represent at least 3 different species. Other species that have previously been called Phaseolus pauciflorus include Vigna dalzelliana (P. pauciflorus Dalzell) and Strophostyles leiosperma (Torr. & A. Gray) Piper (P. pauciflorus Benth.) ==References== pauciflorus Category:Plants described in 1832 Category:Taxa named by Martín Sessé y Lacasta Category:Taxa named by José Mariano Mociño Category:Taxa named by George Don
title: Phaseolus pauciflorus
